properties.entry: SELECT sc_user.* , (select name from sc_security_groups where sc_security_groups.code = sc_user.group_code ) as GROUP_NAME FROM sc_user where status = '1'
INSERT INTO sc_security_groups ( NAME, CREATED, CODE, MEMO ) VALUES ( '{@#name#}', NOW(), '{@#code#}', '{@#memo#}' )
UPDATE sc_security_groups SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , MODIFIED = NOW() , CODE = '{@#code#}' , MEMO = '{@#memo#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'

INSERT INTO sc_security_function ( NAME, PARENT_ID, URL, TYPE, CODE, DISPLAY_ORDER, OPERATION_CODE ) VALUES ( '{@#name#}', '{@#parentId#}', '{@#url#}', '{@#type#}', '{@#code#}', '{@#displayOrder#}', '{@#operationCode#}' )

UPDATE sc_security_function SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , PARENT_ID = '{@#parentId#}' , URL = '{@#url#}' , TYPE = '{@#type#}' , CODE = '{@#code#}', display_order = '{@#displayOrder#}', OPERATION_CODE = '{@#operationCode#}'
WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
UPDATE sc_user SET NAME = '{@#name#}' , {@PASSWORD = '#password#' ,} LOGIN_ID = '{@#account#}' , GROUP_CODE = '{@#group#}' , PHONE = '{@#phone#}' , EMAIL = '{@#email#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
UPDATE sc_user SET PASSWORD ='{@#password#}' WHERE ID = '{@#id#}'
UPDATE sc_user SET status = '0' where ID = '{@#id#}'
select * from sc_user where login_id = '{@#username#}' and status = 1
SELECT * FROM sc_union_seller where 1=1 {@ and account_id = '#accountId#'}

SELECT COUNT(*) as C FROM sc_security_group_function s1,sc_user s2
WHERE s1.group_code = s2.group_code AND s2.login_id = '{@#loginId#}' AND s1.function_code = '{@#code#}'

SELECT ssf.* FROM sc_security_function ssf, sc_security_group_function ssgf, sc_security_groups ssg, sc_user su WHERE ssf.type = 'DATA' AND ssf.CODE = ssgf.FUNCTION_CODE AND ssf.OPERATION_CODE = '{@#code#}' AND ssgf.GROUP_CODE = ssg.CODE AND su.GROUP_CODE = ssg.CODE AND su.LOGIN_ID = '{@#loginId#}'
SELECT * FROM sc_account_product_warning where 1=1 {@ and account_id = '#accountId#'}
SELECT s.* , concat(s.name,'[',s.id,']') AS TEXT FROM sc_security_function s where s.parent_id is null or s.parent_id = ''

SELECT sc_security_function.* FROM sc_security_function where ( parent_id <> 'account' || parent_id IS NULL) and type = 'MENU' and code in ( SELECT sc_security_group_function.function_code FROM sc_security_group_function WHERE sc_security_group_function.FUNCTION_CODE = sc_security_function.code AND sc_security_group_function.GROUP_CODE = '{@#code#}' ) order by display_order
